name: Vagabondia (alpha .01)
description:
Thank you for playing Vagabondia! Submission made for AGDG's Demo Day 10.
While there isn't a ton to do in this version, I hope you enjoy it for what it is right now.
CONTROLS:

  1. WADS: Movement
  2. Left Click: Use Held Item
  3. Right Click: Interact With Item
  4. Space: Roll Towards Cursor
  5. E: Inventory
  6. Q: Talk To NPC
  7. Middle Mouse Button: Quick Select
  8. Tab: Cycle through hot bar
  9. 1-8: Equip corresponding item on hotbar

All feedback, comments, love, hate, bug reporting and questions are appreciated! If you like the game, please follow my development blog at:
rainfrogs.tumblr.com

The music is "Relax Piano Selection 2" by Chino Yoshio, under CC Attribution 3.0
https://soundcloud.com/chino-yoshio/relax-piano-se...
